name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove FBCLIDs tracking parameter from URL

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Facebook adds ?fbclid= tracking parameter to every outbound link. This extension removes them easily by a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove Facebook's extra FBCLIDs tracking parameter from any URL by a single click.
The plugin detects if the URL in the active tab has any tracking code. If so, the extension icon turns active (blue), instead of being inactive (grey).
